Articles.Content:
Hello fellow rocketeers, i'd like to ask if it's possible to mod an internet browser into that game. I am usually browsing at long burns but i want to demount my 2nd screen. I don't know anything about modding, so here da questionz:

1 is it technically possible to do?

2 do you like to see that too?

or

3 is my idea crap?

4 thanks for reading. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T19:01:25Z" title="05/02/2015 07:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by Tyren**

Technically possible, but tricky. It would mean finding a cross-platform web browser component for C# (as opposed to an IE web browser component that'll only work in Windows). There may be something that'll work for Webkit or Gecko.

Not a bad idea, especially for people that like to run full-screen and don't want to alt-tab all the time.

Oh god, I'm now imagining this integrated into RPM.

YouTube in the cockpit, in-flight movies for the passengers, the possibilities are endless
We Steamers alredy have a ingame browser ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
How about the fake fullscreen mode?

Full windowed mode? Works, but ... how to express it...it lacks elegance ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Even so, full windowed with a browser in the foreground your game doesnt longer react on commands, imo with a mod you can avoid this...maybe, dunno. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Full windowed mode? Works, but ... how to express it...it lacks elegance ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> Even so, full windowed with a browser in the foreground your game doesnt longer react on commands, imo with a mod you can avoid this...maybe, dunno. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Lack elegance? How so? I am not talking about a maximized window, but something that looks like fullscreen, yet allows windows in front of it - been playing that way since ever.

But it does - it is an option in the launcher/settings ... not sure right now, but just take a look, background calculation or something like that.

full Window mode is the look-like-fullscreen mode. But you have to force your browser window to the front to make that work as i intend to...wanted to avoid that ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
